title: Plugged By Eoin Colfer
description:
Daniel McEvoy is an Irish ex-soldier cum bouncer at seedy New Jersey casino. His only real friend is the off-beat doctor transplanting his hair. When he evicts an egomaniac lawyer, his life spins out of control. The girl he loves winds up dead, his friend turns up missing, thugs all over town are gunning for him, and his crazy neighbor may be in love with him.

What happens when your girlfriend is murdered and you are suspected of the crime? When your best friend is kidnapped and you happen to kill one of his kidnappers who happen to be the henchman for the most notorious drug peddler in the town? Worse still when your kidnapped friend is living in your head and talking to you as your alter ego? All of this in just one dayÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ and throughout this mayhem the only worry on your mind is about your new hair plugs.

epub and mobi. enjoy and seed.
